data.description:
Autoglym Australia 
presents
Custom Cars and Coffee WA –DECEMBER END OF YEAR MEGA MEET

THIS ONE WILL BE HUGE!!!!

SATURDAY DECEMBER 16th – PERTH MOTORPLEX

*********LATE Arvo Time Slot**********
5 Hr Meet 2.00pm-7.00pm 
Drag Racing starts 3pm

We are super excited to work with the Perth Motorplex crew and offer Cars and Coffee entrants at our December meet to chance to put your machine to test and run it down the quarter mile. 
So grab the family for Late Arvo cruise to the Perth Motorplex- Kwinana to join vehicles from all era’s. Come and check out Perth's most beautiful Muscle Cars, Vintage, Classics, Street Machines, Hotrods, Exotics , Euro, Jap and Bikes for a end of year meet that will include Drag Racing, Music and Food.

We are seeking vendors for stalls/displays, contact me on customcarsandcoffeewa@gmail.com

$10 per Car
$10walk in Spectators/ Bikes/ Family unit- Kids Free                                                           $30 to go Drag Racing

CC&C is arguably WA's most unique high octane coffee get together, for now at a new High-Octane hangout, the Perth Motorplex. Bring a chair or a blanket and sit down with Friends and Family and have a lazy Saturday Arvo checking out Perth’s sweetest Street Machines, Hotrods and Bikes. 

Drag Racing will be open to any Car or Bike that meets the minimum criteria the same as Wednesday night street drags.
The track will be fully prepped and the timing will be operational.

This is the chance to settle those scores with your mates or satisfy that urge you may have always had to give drag racing a go. You will get multiple runs throughout the afternoon.

We will have more details out in the next week, however we will be having a normal 5hr Cars and Coffee meet, with music, food vans, sponsor/vendor displays, and a few things for the kids to do, as well as 4 hrs of drag racing to watch or you if you like have a go for yourself.

We have tried to keep the cost down as low as possible, I think we have come up with a fair price to encourage the whole family to come down and enjoy 5 hrs of automotive candy. Cost will be $10 for all cars/bikes as usual to enter into Cars and Coffee, Spectators will be $10 each, Kids free. Drag racing will be an extra $30 per Car/Driver/Bike.

We are set to have an awesome meet.

Minimum requirements for drag racing will be confirmed this week but are:
Cars;
-Pass safety check (Brakes/Steering/Neutral safety switch operational/Tyres in good Cond etc.)
-Min 3-point lap seat belt 
-Radiator overflow
- No loose items in car
Driver:
- Long Sleeves/pants/socks/enclosed shoes
- Helmet showing the AS/NZS 1698 standard
Bike riders: 
- Full face Helmet showing the AS/NZS 1698 standard
- Riding attire Jacket/long pants including boots that cover the ankle(no sneakers)


Extra Catering vans brought in for this meet so there will be plenty of food, drinks and hot coffee for you to enjoy. We will have some jumpy castles for the kids and a DJ pumping music

If you have friends that hang around in the Vintage, Veteran, Classic, Hotrod, Exotic car or bike scene, encourage them to come for a run. It’s all about the cars!!

Vehicles open to Vintage/Classics cars and bikes, Kustoms, Street Machines, Muscle cars, Lowriders, JDM, Hot Rods and Exotics. Come down for an informal chat about all things Cars/Bikes over a Coffee
We don't care wether its modified, stock, lowered, lifted or vehicles from any age. 
Cars & Coffee Perth are High Octane Coffee Meets are run by Enthusiasts for Enthusiasts keeping the car culture alive

NO Burnouts, chirpies or enthusiastic acceleration in and around the venue!!!
Police will be in attendance

Tools and antisocial behaviour will not be tolerated!!
Please drive responsibly...Your passion; lifestyle and hobby are on show.

Look forward to seeing you at the Plex

Jason and Eleissa

Photo Credit Ashleigh Peake
www.facebook.com/pg/creativefleirephotography
data.name: Cars and Coffee Perth-December End of Year Mega Meet

data.description:
Laadukasta kahvia juhlistetaan neljättä kertaa Pohjois-Euroopan suurimmilla kahvifestivaaleilla Helsingin Kaapelitehtaalla 20.-22.4.2018.
(INFO IN ENGLISH BELOW)

Kevään kuumimmassa tapahtumassa maistellaan laadukkaita kahveja eri puolilta maailmaa yhdellä lipulla.

Tapahtumassa valitaan vuoden kahvi (suodatin ja espresso) sekä yleisö äänestää Suomen parhaan paahtimon ja kahvilan.

Vuoden 2018 festareilla puhutaan erityisesti siitä, miten kahvin kasvualue vaikuttaa makuun ja miten eri maiden kahvilajikkeet eroavat toisistaan. Missä olosuhteissa kahvimarja kasvaa ja mitkä asiat vaikuttavat makuun?

Uutuutena festareilla lanseerataan myös makuparibrunssi!

Tapahtumassa oppii kaiken kahvista, muun muassa valmistamaan kahvia erilaisilla menetelmillä, tunnistamaan makuvivahteita ja makupareja sekä huoltamaan ja puhdistamaan laitteita. Lisäksi voit seurata, kuinka raakapapuja paahdetaan.

Kokopäivälippujen lisäksi tapahtumaan myydään viime kerrasta tuttuja sessiolippuja (aamupäivä- ja iltapäivälippuja) lauantaille ja sunnuntaille.

Festivaaleilla saa vinkkejä kahvihetkien parantamiseen baristoilta ja muilta ammattilaisilta. Festivaalitunnelmaa luovat myös DJ:t, kahvidrinkit, herkut ja esiintyjät.

Pssst. Tapahtumassa myös salateehuone...

Nettisivut: www.helsinkicoffeefestival.com

The biggest coffee festival in the Nordics, Helsinki Coffee Festival is here to stay!

Join the coffee revolution in Finland and learn everything about coffee on 20-22.4.2018 at the Cable Factory, Helsinki.

At the festival it's possible to test different coffees and coffee equipment as well as learn from the baristas at the stands and coffee labs how to make quality coffee at home. Other programme include panel discussions, as well as coffee brunch!

The filter coffee and espresso of the year will be chosen at the festival as well as the best coffee shop and roastery in Finland, which is voted by the audience.

The festival atmosphere is created by the hottest DJs, tasty coffee drinks, delicacies and other interesting programme.

Website: www.helsinkicoffeefestival.com
data.name: Helsinki Coffee Festival 2018

Hyvät Kolon ja taiteen ystävät! 

On aika jälleen juoda kahvia ja piirtää kysytyssä ja tykätyssä elävän mallin piirtämisen Drink & Draw-illassa! 

Tapahtumassa piirretään elävää mallia, ja hyvä kahvi, kynän liikkeet paperilla sekä virtaava soittolista tekevät kokemuksesta meditatiivisen. Jokainen piirustus on uniikki ja lähestymistapa vapaamuotoinen.

Aikaisempaa kokemusta et tarvitse, ja paikan päältä voi lainata piirustusvälineitä. Ilta kestää muutaman tunnin jolloin voit pysähtyä kahvin ja paperin äärelle sinulle sopivan hetken verran. 

Tapahtuma on ilmainen, ja voit varata pientä rahaa mukaan kolehtiin jolla kiitetään mallia.

Pian nähdään Pengerkadulla! Tule, ja anna Kolon pitää sinusta huolta.

Terveisin,

Drink&Draw emännät Salla ja Fredrika

data.description:
The Coffee Show

Είσαι γνώστης του καφέ, αλλά θες να διευρύνεις τους ορίζοντές σου σε ό,τι αφορά στον ευαίσθητο αυτό καρπό και την ανάδειξη των χαρακτηριστικών του; Σ’ αρέσει στην παραδοσιακή μορφή του μορφή, αλλά θες να ανακαλύψεις κι εκείνη που προκύπτει, όταν παντρεύεται με την μοντέρνα;

To Coffee Show που θα διεξαχθεί την άνοιξη του 2018 17 & 18 Απριλίου στο Athinais Cultural Center, Καστοριάς 34-36, Βοτανικός, Αθήνα. 

Καταξιωμένες εταιρείες με μακροχρόνια και εξελικτική πορεία σε ό,τι αφορά στην τέχνη του καφέ, αλλά και φιλόδοξες startup, με φρέσκια οπτική και καινοτόμες προσεγγίσεις, θα παρουσιάσουν νέα προϊόντα και trends.

Η έκθεση αυτή baristi και επαγγελματιών του κλάδου έχει στόχο την εκπαίδευση, την ενημέρωση γύρω από τις νέες τεχνικές παρασκευής και σερβιρίσματος του καφέ, την κατάρτιση των ανθρώπων του κλάδου, με απώτερο σκοπό και την ανάπτυξη του ίδιου, την παρουσίαση καινοτόμων εργαλείων κι εξοπλισμού, αλλά και την γνωριμία με τα προϊόντα μέσα από διαδικασίες γευσιγνωσίας. 

Μέσα από τα σεμινάρια και τις παρουσιάσεις, που θα πραγματοποιούνται καθ’ όλη τη διάρκεια του διημέρου, από τους καλύτερους Έλληνες και διεθνείς γνώστες του είδους, ο επισκέπτης θα έρθει επίσης σε επαφή με επιτυχημένα και καινοτόμα business models.

Η έκθεση απευθύνεται μόνο σε επαγγελματίες.
Ωράριο λειτουργίας: 10.00 – 19.00


Διοργάνωση:
Bar Academy Hellas
Κατσώνη Λάμπρου 36, Αθήνα, TK 11471
Τηλ. 210 640 0540
www.baracademy.gr

data.description:
After his mind-blowingly successful residency at Hï Ibiza, multi-award-winning DJ and producer, Black Coffee, returns to Shimmy Beach Club this December for a second season, with 5 exclusive Friday night shows. With his latest gold rated EP aptly named “The Journey Continues”, Shimmy Beach Club is thrilled to continue their journey with the now world-renowned homegrown superstar and welcome him back to the iconic Shimmy stage.

Black Coffee’s residency will form part of Shimmy Beach Club’s annual Summer Calling campaign and is indeed a highlight on the calendar, with last year’s shows all sold out weeks in advance. The premier party venue balances the style of international party life and the laid-back atmosphere of Cape Town, making it a stylish venue to rival Ibiza’s beach club scenes. This year Black Coffee will be joined by a fresh line-up of local DJs on the decks, including Da Capo and Enoo Napo, contributing to what promises to be a big night out.

The San Antonio Coffee Festival is a celebration of coffee - open to all coffee-lovers!
Taste amazing fresh, locally roasted coffee from all over the world.  Free Admission.  

Meet local coffee artisans from 15 different coffee roasteries who will roast and artfully brew 50 coffees. 
Appreciate the many people who pilot a coffee bean from crop to cup.
Stroll through the shops and the history of La Villita.  
Listen to good music.  Eat some good food.  Arts Activities.  Visit with friends and family.  
Learn about coffee in free demonstrations…all in a fun, comfortable community atmosphere.

Come be a part of history.

data.description:
Taller dirigido a Baristas o Personas que tengan un conocimiento básico de café.

El objetivo del taller es presentar aquellas guías básicas que corresponden al buen manejo y desarrollo de tu negocio, específicamente enfocado en los ‘coffee shops’ (mercadeo, administración, finanzas, recursos humanos). También contará con un foro de expertos en la industria que compartirán sus vivencias, experiencias y expertise dentro de la industria del café.

Recurso: Erica Reyes, Master Barista & Q Grader. Propietaria de la Escuela de Café y Baristas de Puerto Rico.

Panelistas: Érica Reyes (Café Cola'o y Escuela de Café y Baristas), Virgina Rivera (Directora de mercadeo Starbucks PR), Abimael Ruiz, (Café Don Ruiz), Jorge Hernández (PR Coffee Roasters), Mateo Cidre (Tienda Los Cidrines), Anthony Berrios (Banktech)

Capacidad Máxima: 100 personas
Costo: $50.00 por persona (incluye boleto al Expo)
data.name: Taller: ¿Cómo establecer un Coffee Shop? + Panel de la industria

After his mind-blowingly successful residency at Hï Ibiza, multi-award-winning DJ and producer, Black Coffee, returns to Shimmy Beach Club this December for a second season, with 5 exclusive Friday night shows. With his latest gold rated EP aptly named “The Journey Continues”, Shimmy Beach Club is thrilled to continue their journey with the now world-renowned homegrown superstar and welcome him back to the iconic Shimmy stage.

Black Coffee’s residency will form part of Shimmy Beach Club’s annual Summer Calling campaign and is indeed a highlight on the calendar, with last year’s shows all sold out weeks in advance. data.description:
From bean to cup: Auf dem Co­ffee Summit wird eindrucksvoll die komplette Wertschöpfungskette des Kaffees präsentiert! Veranstaltungselemente wie das Rösterdorf oder das Programm für Micro-Röster wurden durch attraktive Highlights im Rahmenprogramm perfekt ergänzt. Gemeinsam mit dem Partner Coffee Consulate wurden spannende Vorträge, Verkostungen von hochwertigen Kaffeespezialitäten und interaktive Workshops angeboten.

Profitieren auch Sie vom 3. bis 7. Februar 2018 vom Stuttgart Coffee Summit durch die perfekte Einbindung in das umfassende INTERGASTRA-Angebot für Konditoreien, Cafés, Eisdielen sowie Cafeterien und die Nähe zur GELATISSIMO.
data.name: Stuttgart Coffee Summit 2018

Nam, Nữ tuổi từ 18 - 25 và chưa có người yêu.

III. Địa điểm tổ chức:
Quán Skyline coffee&milktea số 20 Lạc Thiện Dốc ĐHNT.

IV. Thời gian diễn ra chương trình:
Vòng 1: Nộp hồ sơ 
Từ ngày 21.11 - 5.12
Thể lệ: Các bạn đăng ký theo đường link đính kèm trên trang fanpage và các bài đăng của chương trình Bạn muốn hẹn hò. Sau đó các bạn sẽ được nhận phản hồi từ phía BTC để thông báo về chương trình sắp tới.

Link đăng ký chương trình: https://goo.gl/DWCwFx

Vòng 2: Hẹn hò
Từ ngày 1.12 - 17.12
Thể lệ: Các bạn nhận được phản hồi từ phía BTC sẽ được sắp xếp lịch hẹn và đến địa điểm tổ chức chương trình để tham gia.
Chương trình sẽ được diễn ra vào 
- Chiều thứ 7: từ 15g00 - 17g00
- Sáng chủ nhật : từ 9g00 - 11g00
Lưu ý: Các bạn được nhận phản hồi từ BTC phải cam kết những thông tin mình đưa là chính xác và phải lên đúng lịch hẹn. Bất cứ thay đổi nào phải thông báo trước cho BTC 3 ngày. 

** Mỗi đôi tham dự sẽ được tặng 1 Voucher uống nước tại Skyline.

Vòng 3: Chung kết
Ngày 23.12 Vào lúc 20g00 tại quán Skyline.
Thể lệ: Các bạn sau khi vượt qua vòng 2 sẽ được BTC tặng 1 kiểu ảnh và các bạn sẽ chia sẻ đến bạn bè để nhận nhiều like, share và điểm số sẽ được tính:
Like , share = 1 điểm
Thả tim = 2 điểm
Thời gian bắt đầu tính điểm từ 10g00 ngày 18.12.2017 đến 22g00 ngày 22.12.2017 và bài chính thức tính điểm sẽ lấy từ trang sự kiện.

Giải thưởng: 
-  Giải nhất: 1 khóa học Tiếng Anh giao tiếp tại Skyline trị giá 1.800k
1 cặp vé tham dự đêm Noel ấm cúm tại Skyline. Và những Voucher Shopping hấp dẫn.
- Giải nhì: 1 cặp vé xem phim từ rạp Lotte Cinema ngày 24.12, 1 cặp vé tham dự đêm Noel ấm cúm tại Skyline. Và những Voucher Shopping hấp dẫn.
- Giải ba: 1 phần quà noel từ chương trình, 1 cặp vé tham dự đêm Noel ấm cúm tại Skyline. Và những Voucher Shopping hấp dẫn.

*** Lưu ý chung: Mọi hình ảnh, clip và thông tin sẽ được BTC sử dụng vào mục đích quảng bá hình ảnh. Những thông tin cá nhân của người chơi sẽ được giữ bí mật. Khi tham gia chương trình thì các bạn phải tuân thủ quy định của chương trình, bất cứ vấn đề xảy ra phải nghe hướng dẫn từ BTC.

data.description:
Official announcement: Fashion talk #facetofaceseries12, Fashion Marketing from offline to online: How brands stand out? - Để thương hiệu trỗi dậy!

Khách mời: Marketing Director Trần Hà Mi

Bạn thân mến. Vào tháng 4/2017, ở Fashion Talk số 4, cuộc trò chuyện có chủ đề: Fashion Marketing Chiến lược và cảm hứng? cùng chị Trần Hà Mi đã để lại nhiều ấn tượng và bài học quan trọng. Rất nhiều bạn bày tỏ niềm mong muốn có thêm một cuộc trò chuyện nữa, vì bức tranh marketing thời trang thực sự rộng lớn và người trẻ không biết phải xoay xở thế nào trên "đường băng ấy".

Giờ đây, chúng tôi mời chị trở lại lần nữa, với một chủ đề thuộc về Fashion Marketing 4.0.

Trong kỷ nguyên số, nơi Pinterest như Look book kiểu mới; Google, Youtube là những thư viện thời trang mở (Google vừa ra mắt dự án We wear culture); Instagram ghi dấu văn hoá đại chúng; Facebook & Facebook live! trở thành kênh truyền thông quan trọng; Amazon, Net-A-Porter chào mừng bạn đến thế giới thời trang mới, chỉ qua một cú click chuột...

Những sàn diễn luôn không bao giờ chết. Tuy nhiên, luật chơi mới là gì? Làm thế nào Để thương hiệu trỗi dậy?

F.A.C.E Fashion Workshop thân mời bạn tham dự Fashion talk #facetofaceseries12: Fashion Marketing from offline to online: How brands stand

Thông tin về Ms Trần Hà Mi:
Chị Trần Hà Mi có bằng Thạc sĩ về Quản trị kinh doanh và Marketing thời trang tại ESMOD International ở Paris, từng làm việc tại Circus&Ci ở kinh đô thời trang này và làm việc ba tháng tại tạp chí Vogue Mỹ.
Cô trở về Việt Nam làm phụ trách Marketing cho Gucci Việt Nam một thời gian ngắn trước khi chuyển đến Ringier Việt Nam ở vị trí giám đốc Marketing Elle Việt Nam từ năm 2011 đến 2014. Trước khi chuyển đến vị trí Head of Marketing at Leflair, a premium flash-sale e-commerce website.
Chị Hà Mi là người sáng lập #hashtag #unghontkviet với sự tham gia của rất nhiều người có ảnh hưởng trong ngành công nghiệp thời trang nội địa.

Save the date:
F.A.C.E pop-up cafe & Open Day Saigon:
Thời gian: 10g00, 26/11/2017, 
Địa điểm: Dinosys cafe, 204 Pasteur, Q.3
Form đăng kí: https://goo.gl/forms/I5p71qKYDkssSpPp2

F.A.C.E pop-up cafe & Open Day Hanoi:
Thời gian: 10g00, 10/12/2017, 
Địa điểm: Toong co-working space, 8 Tràng Thi, Q. Hoàn Kiếm
Form đăng kí: https://goo.gl/forms/whxr6N6kJrUroVjl1

* Dịp này, workshop giảng dạy về Fashion marketing cũng được diễn ra tại F.A.C.E Fashion Workshop trong 2 ngày, 9-10/12/2017. Liên hệ Hotline để biết thêm thông tin.
data.name: Fashion Marketing Từ offline đến online: Để thương hiệu trỗi dậy

data.description: Join HistoryMiami Museum and explore one of Miami’s trendiest and most dynamic neighborhoods – the Wynwood Art District. Learn how this textile warehouse and immigrant neighborhood, formerly known as “Little San Juan,” is quickly becoming the world’s largest outdoor art gallery. Stroll past vast murals and various street art displays, as you listen to the history of graffiti from the advent of written language to today. Hear stories of the artists, residents, and developers who made Wynwood home to over seventy galleries, five museums, and seven art complexes.
data.name: Wynwood: A History of Street Art

Tickets are going fast! Get yours today!

https://www.eventbrite.com/o/lakeshore-family-resources-and-casa-court-appointed-special-advocates-7416809771


About:

Join us for a holiday event of fun, laughs and creativity. We begin with our jolly conductors aboard our own magical trolleys that start at Manitowoc Coffee for a joy ride to the Holiday Inn (North Pole) that includes a quick visit with a special guest, complete with carols and holiday cheer. At the North Pole, there will be a holiday party complete with craft activities, refreshments, entertainment, story telling at more. The most exciting part of all, Santa has made time in his busy schedule to be there for the party and will be available for photos.

Tickets Include:

* 20 minute Magical Trolley Ride
* Visit and Professional 5x7 Photo with Santa
* Cookie Decorating and Hot Chocolate
* Crafts and Games
*Face Painting
* Hatrack Story Telling Performances
*Special Bell to Remind you of the Spirit of the Holidays
* Children’s tickets include choice of a Hardcover Holiday themed book to be chosen at time of ticket purchase

Child tickets (Ages 1-13): $20
Adult tickets: $25

**Children under 1 year of age can experience the event for free with the purchase of an adult ticket. You can purchase a $15 ticket for a child under 1 if you would like for them to have a book of their own.
The Hoilday Inn in Manitowoc is offering a reduced hotel rate for Friday and/or Saturday night for $69/night. You must show your event ticket to receive the reduced rate.

You CAN purchase tickets WITHOUT having a PayPal account. When it asks for payment information, click on the pictures of the credit cards or PayPal logo. This will take you to another screen that asks you to log in to PayPal. If you look just below the PayPal information there is a grey button that says 'pay with credit/debit card'.

We encourage everyone, adults included, to come to the event in their pajamas. We are also encouraging the spirit of giving by asking families to gift a new pair of pajamas to be given to a child in need.
**Please note, this is a fundraiser for Court Appointed Special Advocates (CASA) and Lakeshore Family Resources, programs of Lakeshore CAP. All proceeds will go to benefit vulnerable children in our service area. Tickets will not be refunded in the case of inclement weather and the event will not be rescheduled. Additionally, no ticket refunds will be offered for any reason. If you are unable to attend you may give or sell your tickets to another party. By purchasing tickets you agree to these conditions.

Join us for a magical trolley ride to the North Pole!  Ticket price includes:

*Round trip ride on a magical (heated) trolley from Manitowoc 
 Coffee to the North Pole.
*5x7 professional photo with Santa

*Performances by the Hatrack Storytellers
*Games and more!
*Children's tickets include a special gift to be selected at time of ticket purchase

data.description:
Free with RSVP: 

PART I

Building on foundational works of Fanon, Cesaire, Memmi, Wynter, and others, this participatory and deeply imaginative workshop explores how the practices of racism manifest through institutions and organizations, impacting the psychic wholeness of program participants. 

In recent decades, much research has been conducted on stress, physiological symptoms and their relationship to institutional (organizational) and systemic racism; heart disease, maternal stress, depression, etc. Orchestrated through policy, imagery, narrative, history, culture, it is this sleight of hand and its impact on the soul that will be explored collectively.

This program is led by Amber McZeal, M.A. who’s organization 'Decolonizing the Psyche' focuses on the role of sacred scholarship and liberation arts practices in social and cultural transformation.
__________

PART II

Effective methods of treatment and research for mental illness and mood disorders, as they relate to the black community, are lacking. Historical and social variables are generally overlooked, with the impact of colonialism, the slave trade, and institutional racism seldom making the conversation. 

To believe that all depression and/or mental illness, and/or grief is created equal, to assume that predominately European models and methods can provide non-Europeans with proper diagnosis, treatment, or healing insults the depth of our history, risks ignoring the origin of our mental illness, undermines the aptitude of our sovereign state, ultimately leaving us more broken.

To achieve psychic wholeness, we must acknowledge and confront the harm committed by contemporary institutions of 'healing.’ Led by a consortium of wellness workers, this program is a space and time for healers and the healing to collectively navigate the origin, reality, and dismantling of an unspoken legacy. 

This program is led by Kalkidan Gebreyohannes who has her degree in psychology and has worked closely with young girls dealing with mental illness, drug addiction, behavioral issues and victims of sexual abuse. After moving away from this career with many life changes in between she has decided to make the collective healing of our community as it relates to mental health a priority, through truthful conversations, vulnerability, community building, nutrition and health.

*In the spirit of decoloniality, these programs are participatory, dialogical, nonhierarchical, and radically conversational.
__________
'Fanon: Decolonizing the Psyche: From Theory to Practice' is presented by MATATU within a body of workshops that navigate self-determination, wellness, sovereignty, and roadmaps to the future. The workshops are free to the public and funded by Akonadi Foundation's Beloved Community Fund.

MATATU is a platform for conversation, experience, and expression that helps ordinary people share their journeys. Together, we hope to enhance empathy and understanding of the global human condition. 

We are a fiscally sponsored project of Intersection for the Arts. Learn more about us at www.matatu.co
data.name: Fanon: Decolonizing the Psyche - From Theory to Practice

data.description:
As the year comes to a close this fundraiser hopes to bring us together for a night of art, activism and discussion on how to keep organising to support refugees and end detention. 

Bringing you performances by
<3 Racerage
<3 Bobuq
<3 Tracey Pham goes Loopy
<3 Essie Williams

 (more to be updated soon)

as well as two short films
A Jolly Swagman 
&
Ali 707
 *****followed by a Q & A with the people who made them***** 
 
and a panel of activists from various groups about how to keep the pressure on & how to organise within your own community while also supporting the broader movement. 

This event is taking place on the land of the Wurundjeri people. We pay respects to Elders past and present and would like to express gratitude for the knowledge that has been shared with us. This land is stolen. Sovereignty never ceded. 

Loop bar is an accessible venue. 


Racerage is an emerging politi-cute queer post-internet rapper based on Wurundjeri country. Their lyrical themes draw from their background in spoken word; focussing on the struggles, frustrations and interweb memery of intersectional feminism, decolonisation, race issues and the queer bubble. Racerage collaborates primarily with other QTIPOC beatmakers and artists and is excited about creating creative expression within and about their communities.
https://www.facebook.com/raceragerhymes/?hc_ref=ARRXQgHkSdcUncU8Uj_k-FNwZWVv4sGn5BFI20HsflFqZ3slETZTyhIhq-gIWsDSJFw&fref=nf


Bobuq is a freelance writer, interdisciplinary artist and community organiser of the Afghan diaspora. They co-edit Archer Magazine and they are the founder of the QTPoC activist collective, Colour Tongues. Their work has appeared in Kill Your Darlings, Black Girl Dangerous, Overland, Peril and Vice.

Tracey Pham goes Loopy
Tracey is a proud QPOC based in Melbourne. Her sudden addiction to her electric guitar in 2016 has led her to write her own magical tunes. They present various aspects of her queer AF life with a focus on friendship, mental health, self-care, heartbreak, and disappointment. She hopes that fellow queers can find some resonance and comfort in the tunes. 
https://traceyphamgoesloopy.bandcamp.com/

The Jolly Swagman
Once a Jolly Swagman... came here by boat! Ravi fled civil chaos in his homeland of Sri Lanka, hoping for a better life in Australia... but the Australian Government had other ideas.
At the height of civil unrest in Sri Lanka, Ravi (Tamil) felt that he had no other choice but to jump on a leaky boat and try to make his way to Australia in order to seek asylum. The Australian Government had other plans for Ravi. Through a deliberate juxtaposition, Ravi shares his personal story of life inside the Nauru Immigration Detention Centre, to a back-drop of haunting instrumental renditions of ‘Waltzing Matilda’. He tells of the devastating chaos that led him to flee his homeland, the treacherous boat journey that found him imprisoned indefinitely, and the ongoing mental health issues that he faces now that he’s been released temporarily into Australian society.
Trigger Warning - Abuse, rape, torture, suicide
Explicit Language Warning


ALI 707
Ali is an Afghan man seeking refuge in Australia but has ended up in the Woomera Detention Centre - the infamous subject of asylum seeker debate from 1999-2003. Ali runs. He runs compulsively, back and forth between the compound fences in the stark South Australian summer. Red dirt beneath his feet, trapped, he runs like a mad man, day in day out, until... he collapses and is taken to the Royal Adelaide Hospital. And somewhere along the way, he finds his freedom.

Essie Williams is a folk-rock songstress from Melbourne. Armed with her electric guitar and soulful voice, Essie sings of love, heartache, and human rights. Stay in touch with her through:
Instagram - @essiewilliamsmusic
FB - www.facebook.com/essiewilliamsmusic/

Panel discussing How to keep organising featuring activists from groups 
<3 No Pride In Detention 
https://www.facebook.com/NoPrideInDetentionOz/
<3 Refugee Action Collective
https://www.facebook.com/racvic/

more to be announced. 


If you haven't already please get over and like the RISE page and 
https://www.facebook.com/RefugeesSurvivorsAndExdetainees/
We at the youareloved collective want to support and put forward the voices of refugees and ex-detainees first. Check out this video for ways to support and go to the page to donate
https://www.facebook.com/RefugeesSurvivorsAndExdetainees/videos/1902358849804245/

Tickets are $10 and there will be extra items for sale if you have some spare cash to put in please bring it with you. Tickets for the films are limited (due to seating) but the event will run for some time and we expect that there will be room for more people so stay in touch with the page if it sells out.

data.description:
This is our LAST big Open Farm and Snuggle party of 2017, as we prepare to hunker down for a cold winter.

With the arrival of our ELEVEN foster puppies, the snuggles get even cuter! Baby cow kisses from our superstars Maximus, George, Ralphie and little Forrest, pig belly rubs and of course, SO MANY sweet goats who can't wait to see you.

We will have lots of gift items for sale, including our now -famous vegan, gluten/nut/soy free chocolate truffles, shortbread dough, jams from RedCamper and sponsorships...the perfect gift for the animal lover in your life!

$5 per person entry fee.

As always, you can bring treats to feed the goats...if you are ready to brave many obnoxious little treat-seekers ready to search out and take everything you've got.

What foods are okay to bring to open farm days??? How do you feed a goat? Or pigs??

Goats are picky and should not (usually wont) eat off the ground. If you hold the bite sized piece in your fingers, they should take it pretty gently.

Piggies are a different story. They dont see well and rely mostly on smell for food finding. If your fingers smell like food, they will probably be mistaken for food. Pigs have SHARP teeth! 

The best way to feed pigs is either a whole fruit with plenty of room between the food and your hand, or let them stick a snout through the fence panel before you feed so they cant jump forward. Or, even safer, drop it on the ground. Pigs are not picky at all.

Cut into bite sized pieces, peels/skin on:

Apples
Celery
Citrus fruits
Kale leaves
Berries
Melon
Bananas 
Carrots 
Squash 
Lettuce/greens
Cucumbers 
Broccoli 
Green beans
Pineapple
Pumpkins
Pears

All of the above are fine to bring whole for the pigs only. Last week we almost had a choking incident with a goat swallowing a whole apple. Dont want to do that again!

Our biggest no-nos are stone fruits like peaches/plums/cherries and avocados. Both of those are not good for anyone here!

Nothing moldy or slimy, please!

Also seems like a good place to mention, please leave your animal companions at home. We will not allow any outside animals on the property, nor left in cars. Just an extremely important safety note!
data.name: Holiday Fundraiser Open Farm, Gift Market And (Puppy) Snuggle

data.description:
★★RESIS'DANCE★★

We are a diverse group of women taking hold of the tech and decks, smashing the patriarchy and supporting under funded radical grassroots organisations. We came together to organise banging party nights - whilst challenging gender norms in the party and political scene.

We're back for one last party this year and we're very excited to be fundraising solely for The London Latinxs who still have a long way to go in their campaign to cover outstanding legal fees associated with their ongoing battle to #SaveLatinVillage / Wards Corner.
 
★The London Latinxs★

The London Latinxs is a grassroots diaspora group of feminist Latin American migrants and decent activists. They organise on intersectional issues affecting the Latin American and migrant communities in the UK through community organizing, campaigning and different forms of creative direct actions. London Latinxs ultimately works towards a world without borders and free from oppression, where we can live our identities in community, with respect, dignity and empanadas for everyone.

If you wish to donate to this cause you can do via the #SaveLatinVillage crowdfunding page:
https://www.youcaring.com/latinvillagewardscorner-912536

★★★★★★★★★★★★

Line-up;

Mica Coca & ZAFFIRE

+ Guests:
El Tuma of Maricumbia (https://soundcloud.com/el-tumaqueno)
DJ Dibs of Goldsnap (https://soundcloud.com/dj-dibs-1)
RABZ of Bbz London & Sorryyoufeeluncomfortable (https://soundcloud.com/rabz-lansiquot)

★★★★★★★★★★★★

★DETAILS★ 
FIVE MILES
39B Markfield Rd
London 
N15 4QA

★ Access ★ 
Wheelchair Accessible and accessible toilet. Please get in touch if we can make the night any more accessible for you.

★ SAFER SPACES POLICY★ 
At Resisdance there's zero tolerance to sexual harassment, unwanted touching, stalking and all forms of abuse or discrimination based on race, gender, disability, sexuality, religion or age. People who can't respect this aren't welcome and will be thrown out. If you experience it, or see someone else being harassed or on the receiving end of discriminatory abuse, find a member of Resisdance, our SAFER SPACES CREW or security - we believe and will support you.

★ Five Miles ★
Five Miles priorities the safety of all of our customers. We understand that non male folk and LGBTQI people can feel unsafe in nightlife. To this end we have implemented a phone charging system within our cloakroom so that you can ensure you do not leave our venue with a dead phone battery. Please always make sure your friends know where you are and never leave without telling them you are going.

★TICKETS★ 
£3 unwaged, £5 waged, £7 solidarity.
Tickets available at the door

data.description:
Hey everyone, I’m David Morrison and I’m the owner of Kind Burger.

Kind Burger will be unlike any other food truck, vegan or otherwise, in that it will donate 100% of net profits to nonprofits that work with animals.

I’ve been trying for two years to fund Kind Burger completely on my own without a bank loan so the company has no debt upon startup and can immediately start raising money for animal nonprofits. However, I am starting to realize perhaps I was too ambitious to believe I could do this on my own, so now I am reaching out to all of you!

On Saturday, June 23rd (2018), instead of Kind Burger opening for business, Friendly Food Truck Family will be holding a “Super Roundup” fundraiser for Kind Burger which will have 20 food trucks (all serving 100% vegan food), a cash bar/beer garden, live music, booths, vendors, and much more!

Kind Burger will have a booth selling a limited selection from our menu and prepaid gift cards. The gift cards are our way of asking for donations. Basically, instead of asking for a handout, we're just asking you to pre-pay for your food and redeem it when we open. Additionally, all trucks and vendors will donate 10% of their sales.

I want to thank you all for your patience and continued enthusiasm and support for Kind Burger. Let’s all pull together and make this fundraiser a success so we can get Kind Burger out in the streets serving delicious vegan food and raising money for animal nonprofits!
data.name: Kind Burger Fundraiser Kickoff

data.description:
On December 8th we will be holding a benefit party at SWG3 to raise money for our good friend Moe Abutoq. 

Jack & Jasper will be joined by Artwork, Joshua, Jonjosé & Celino as we try to raise as much as possible to help fund breakthrough MS treatment for Moe in Mexico.

MS differs in every person but at the moment its has caused Moe serious physical difficulties over the past two years, resulting in severe tremors in both hands. Everyday tasks you and I take for granted verge on impossible. The disease has progressed to the point where it is affecting his balance, speech and everyday life.

Sadly there is currently no cure for MS and the medication prescribed by the NHS is not working, though there is a breakthrough stem cell treatment available in Mexico that offers Moe another chance at leading a normal life. Stem cell treatment essentially re-starts your whole system and in the majority of cases it has amazing results. Like every treatment it has its risks, but Moe and his family know it is the best option available.

Tickets for the party are only £10, though if you can contribute any more towards Moe’s treatment, please do so using the following link: https://www.justgiving.com/crowdfunding/ahmed-abutoq-1

THANK YOU!
data.name: MS Fundraiser For Moe: Jackmaster, Jasper James, Artwork & More

**This is a PRIVATE, 21+, RSVP-ONLY event. We will not allow registration at the door. Sorry, it’s the law!** Message us to get on the guestlist at lisanorml5280@gmail.com. 

Please join us for Denver NORML’s 3RD Annual Holidaze fundraiser! This event is FREE thanks to our sponsor, Lightshade Labs. It will be a casual, 21+ event, infused with botanicals from start to finish. Enjoy amazing food and drinks including an awesome silent auction with tons of options for holiday gifts, with Rameau Control & Indigo Peak hosting for the night.

This is our biggest fundraiser of the year. Your generosity will ensure that we will have a successful local lobby day, and help us reform marijuana laws at the state and federal levels. This fundraiser allows us to have an educational experience in Washington D.C. with National NORML and other chapters from across the country! 

Dress Code // Come as you are!

Food trucks: Burgerchief will be there for the munchies ;) 

Raffle // Every donation includes a raffle ticket to win the grand prize -TBD

Silent Auction // Door prizes - Be prepared to bid and win amazing items.

Fund the Cause // Learn about the impactful things Denver NORML is doing and how you can help.

We are looking for the following Sponsorships:

$5,000 - Platinum  

$2,000 - Gold 

$1,000 - Silver: 
Thank you Lightshade and IHeartJane, Metlo & Drone Ninja Photography. 

$500 -  Bronze
Thank you Quest Concentrates, Freely Loved Hemp and Concentrate Supply Co., Kaviar, BioTrack THC, Ripe Dispensary

$Other Amount


Q&A'S:

Q:Will I be able to bring any extra guests to the door and register them there?
A: NO, their names must be registered before the day of the event. 

Q:Will there be any specific dress codes?
A: Come casual or anything holiday ready :)

QHow can I become a sponsor? You have the information listed, but nowhere to donate!
A: Actually, we come to YOU! Whether's it's cash, business check, or a debit/credit card, please email denverisnorml@gmail.com with headliner "SPONSORSHIP." It will be a great way to reach out to a fresh crowd of ganja enthusiasts!!

QAny music or food provided? I'm going to get the munchies won't I...?
A: Yes, we will have live music for the first half and house music spinning to end the night. Food is still in the works, but thank you to Oskar Blues Brewery for helping us out with Drinks :). 

QHow will silent auction work? Cash? Card? Prizes?
A: Be ready cause we accept all forms and will be giving away freebies throughout the night!

data.description:
Fun Events welcomes Big Brothers Big Sisters and Helena Food Share back for another friendly battle at the 6th Annual Dueling Pianos Fundraiser.  Come for a fun night of singing along, dancing, comedy, and outrageous piano playing!  The two organizations will be facing off to see who can sell more tickets and raise the most in song requests to the dueling pianists. Each organization takes home the proceeds that their supporters donate.

Never seen dueling pianos?  The adult audience shows were made popular on the Vegas Strip and in New Orleans on Bourbon Street.   This show will have two performers from the national known 176 Keys Dueling Fun Pianos on stage working together as a musical-comedy team nonstop for three hours.  It’s a great variety show, mixing humor with classics like Elton John or Billy Joel to contemporary hits and country.  The event is NOT a concert. The piano players lead a musical PARTY! 

General Admission tickets are $30 and can be bought online, at Island Liquor or either of the nonprofit's offices .  Reserved Seating will only be available online.  Tables of four are closest to the stage and are $200 or tables of ten are $450.  The event has sold out every year so get your tickets now!  

Doors will open at 7 with show at 8. Nonstop fun until 11.  Must be 21+ to attend.
data.name: Dueling Pianos Fundraiser with Fun Pianos!

Jam for Hamm!

A fundraiser benefitting local musician Michael Hamm. Michael has been an active member of the local music scene for over 20 years and he also teaches guitar lessons to children and adults. Earlier this month, he suffered a brain aneurysm and was life-flighted to St. Luke’s Hospital in Kansas City. His recovery has been slow, but steady.

The Granada and Lucia Beer Garden & Grill are hosting a benefit show for Michael to raise money for his medical bills and recovery. Multiple bands will perform including:  

SUNU
The Band That Saved The World

data.description:
DeVries Nature Conservancy is hosting its seventh annual Sleigh Ride and Fireside Supper Fundraiser over 2 weekends in January!

REGISTRATION IS OPEN NOW!

Guests will enjoy a 30 minute horse-drawn sleigh ride along the beautiful wooded trails at DeVries. Afterwards, warm up inside with a hearty meal catered by Roma’s Back Door in Owosso, gourmet brownies, and a mug of hot chocolate - all served next to a roaring fire.

Reservations and pre-payment are required. Eight time slots are available each day. The sleigh will accommodate 13 adult passengers, with small children on laps – the perfect size for church groups, social clubs and extended family outings. You can buy individual tickets, or reserve a whole sleigh at a discounted rate. Prices are $35 for adults and $15 for children. 

Schedule of sleigh rides:
Saturdays (January 13th and 27th):
11:45, 12:30, 1:15, 2:00, 2:45, 3:30, 4:15, 5:00
Sundays (January 14th and 28th):
12:30, 1:15, 2:00, 2:45, 3:30, 4:15, 5:00, 5:45

In the event of unfavorable snow conditions, a horse-drawn wagon will be used instead of the sleigh and will be decked out in lights and sleigh bells.

Register by calling 989-723-3365. Credit card or check accepted.

Not available on the fundraiser dates? Don't fret. Private sleigh rides can be booked almost any day of winter if we have 5 inches of snow. Prices start at $195, and reservations can be made just days in advance. Call 989-723-3365 to book.

Gift Certificates are available for those that would like to give the present of a sleigh ride.
data.name: Sleigh Ride & Fireside Supper Fundraiser

data.description:
The Cambodian League for the Promotion of Defense and Human Rights (LICADHO) is holding a fundraising event on 9 December 2017 for the “Early Years Behind Bars” project. This project monitors and supports the rights and welfare of children and pregnant women living in the 18 prisons (out of a total of 28) that LICADHO monitors.

Under Cambodian prison law, infants can stay behind bars with their mothers until the age of three. They often stay longer. Though prison is far from an ideal environment for infants, it is often the only option when relatives are unable to look after them.

Unfortunately, infants and pregnant women behind bars are often denied critical access to basic health care, adequate nutrition and education. Children are too often deprived of their most basic rights. Prison authorities only allocate an additional 1400 riel ($0.35) per child for food and other basic needs.

“The worst part of being in prison was when my daughter was sick,” said one recently-released woman interviewed by LICADHO who was jailed for two years on a minor drug offense along with her six-month-old child. “I was really afraid she would have big problems… I really felt bad for her and tried to buy milk for her because she could not eat the food.”

LICADHO works with partner organisations to provide extra food and material support to growing numbers of infants and pregnant women behind bars. There are currently more than 100 children and about 50 pregnant women in the prisons that LICADHO monitors, which is a substantial increase on recent years.

This is largely due to the widespread use of pre-trial detention and the government’s “war on drugs”, which began on 1 January 2017. The majority of pregnant women and mothers with small children arrested this year were detained for suspected drug offences as part of a wider crackdown that has put more than ten thousand people behind bars.

The fundraiser features an all-Cambodian musical line up:

 Full-throated rock’n’roll with Channthy Cha Cha (with Kak Channthy, lead singer of the Cambodian Space Project)
 A special acoustic set by Kampot Playboys
 Rising star Vartey Ganiva.

There will also be an auction and raffle. Watch this space for more on auction and raffle prizes!

Date: Saturday, 9 December 2017 (eve of International Human Rights Day).
Venue: Samai, #9b, Street 830, Tonle Bassac

Tickets: $30 on sale via:

Jo-Ann Lim
Lauren Jeffreys

Or at the following locations:

Samai, #9b, Street 830, Tonle Bassac
Lot 369, #13C, Street 454, Toul Tom Poung
FCC Phnom Penh, #363 Sisowath Quay

If you would like to help support our project but are unable to attend the fundraiser, please help us by donating at:

https://www.youcaring.com/childrenandpregnantwomenlivingincambodianprisons-994799

All donations will be very much appreciated!

For more information contact:
Jo-Ann Lim, LICADHO Prison Project Consultant
Tel: 077 851 411
E-Mail: prison2@licadho-cambodia.org
data.name: Early Years Behind Bars Fundraiser

data.description:
On Saturday January 20th, 2018 at 12:30 PM the Colorado Avalanche prepare to FACEOFF FOR FALLEN OFFICERS against the New York Rangers at the Pepsi Center.

The Colorado Avalanche will be honoring Brotherhood for the Fallen and the Colorado Fallen Hero Foundation together as their non-profits of the game!

As you step onto Chopper Circle at the Pepsi Center you will find Aurora Police Department police SWAT vehicles among other agencies, as you step into the Pepsi Center Lobby you will be greeted by the Colorado Emerald Society Pipes and Drums, then you'll take your seats early for the pre-game ceremonies that you do not want to miss including the Colorado state honor guard team consisting of members of the Aurora and Thornton Colorado Police Department presenting the colors with the thin blue line flags, a moment of silence for our fallen officers, more pipes and drums playing and a special moment for all officers in attendance.

Wait! There's more to come! Stay tuned in as we finalize some amazing details such as commerative challenge coins for early purchases to this event. 

Special pricing will be available on the upper and lower attack twice side in which your discounted, under face value ticket includes a $5.00 donation to each non-profit!

This is the first time the Colorado Avalanche has done so much for law enforcement and they are excited to show their support, so lets not disasppoint! Hockey and Law Enforcement are a match made in heaven!

JOSS WHEDON'S SERENITY & JOSS WHEDON'S BUFFY THE VAMPIRE SLAYER double feature
Joss Whedon's SERENITY (PG-13, 2005, 119 min)

A passenger with a deadly secret. Six rebels on the run. An assassin in pursuit. When the renegade crew of Serenity agrees to hide a fugitive on their ship, they find themselves in a battle between the relentless military might of a totalitarian regime that will destroy anything to get the girl back and the bloodthirsty creatures who roam the uncharted areas of space. But, the greatest danger of all may be on their ship. From the mind of Joss Whedon comes an edge-of-your-seat adventure loaded with explosive battles, gripping special effects and fantastic new Worlds!

and

Joss Whedon's BUFFY THE VAMPIRE SLAYER (PG-13, 1992, 86 min)

Blonde, bouncy Buffy (Kristy Swanson) is your typical high school cheerleader. Her goal is to "marry Christian Slater and die" and shop. All that changes when a strange man (Donald Sutherland) informs her she's been chosen by fate to kill vampires. With the help of a romantic rebel (Luke Perry), Buffy is soon spending school nights protecting L.A. from The Vampire King (Rutger Hauer), his sidekick. Lefty (Paul Ruebens) and their determined gang of bloodsuckers.

data.description:
Dyer Fraternal Order of Police Lodge 169 is honored to host the Fifth Annual Northwest Regional SWAT fundraiser. The Team is a multi-jurisdictional emergency response team comprised of Police Officers from nine Police Departments in Lake County.  Dyer Police Department is proud to have five Dyer Police Officers as members of the Team. The Team is responsible for the protection of over 200,000 residents in an area that is over 130 square miles. 

The Northwest Regional SWAT Team is an organization that relies on its members to raise money to purchase equipment, maintain vehicles, and provide quality training for its officers. The Northwest Regional SWAT Team is a not for profit organization and donations made to it are tax deductible under section 170 (c) (1) of the Internal Revenue Code.

The event will items donated by local businesses for raffle as well as many firearms on display for raffle provided by Blythe's Sport Shop of Griffith. An entry fee of $30 ahead of time and $35 at the door includes dinner as well as unlimited draft beer. For the fifth year in a row Three Floyds Brewery Co. has been gracious enough to donate many kegs of beer for the event. For the third year in a row Whole Foods Market of Schererville is donating pastries for the desert table. This year Byway Brewery, Saint John Malt Brothers, Greenbush Brewery, Laguntias, and Devil’s Trumpet are also donating kegs of beer. We hope to have beers on tap from other local breweries as well.  The Bagpipes and Drums of the Emerald Society Chicago Police Department will be making a performance around 8:00 PM.

For tickets or to make a donation please see any Team member, message this page, comment below, contact Team Commander Robert Morgan at 219-769-3531, or email dyerfop@gmail.com This event has been approved by the Indiana State Gaming Division being issued Gaming License number 145702.

data.description:
🔉Today's, the amount of existing digital 
     data obtained from various resources is 
     growing in a tremendous rate. The big 
     data science field aims to deal with a 
     huge amount of data that is most often    
     impossible to store in the memory of a 
     single computer, and this would be from 
     various perspectives including: big data 
     cleaning, preparation, and analysis as 
     well as extracting insights and 
     information from large structured and 
     unstructured data sets. 

الان في ظل زيادة كمية البيانات الرقمية الموجودة و التي يتم الحصول عليها من مختلف الموارد بمعدلات هائله. تهدف علوم البيانات الكبيرة الي التعامل مع الكميات الضخمة من البيانات التي من المستحيل في أغلب الأحيان تخزينها في ذاكرة جهاز كمبيوتر واحد، و يتم ذلك من منظورات مختلفة بما في ذلك: تنقيه البيانات الكبيرة، وإعدادها ، وتحليلها، وكذلك استخراج التصورات والمعلومات من مجموعات  البيانات المنظمة وغير المنظمة. 

💪Due to the importance of such field and 
     its various applications in industry, 
🏢National Telecommunication Institute-
     NTI is organizing a workshop on "Big 
     data science" gathers the big data 
     specialists and data scientists in Egypt 
     from multinational companies, academia 
     and private sector to share their 
     knowledge and expertise across multiple 
     industries. 

و نظرا لأهمية هذا المجال وتطبيقاته المختلفة في الصناعة، يقوم المعهد القومي للاتصالات السلكية واللاسلكية بتنظيم ورشة عمل بشأن 'علوم البيانات الكبيرة' بالتعاون مع الشركات المتعددة الجنسيات والخبراء من الأوساط الأكاديمية والقطاع الخاص من اجل تبادل المعرفه والخبره عبر الصناعات المتعددة.

🎯The objective of the workshop is to  
      provide a general overview of big data 
      science, its main concepts and 
      perspectives with an eye on some of its 
      industrial applications, in addition to a 
      big data science tutorial.

وسوف تقدم ورشة العمل لمحة عامة عن علوم البيانات الكبيرة، ومفاهيمها الرئيسية ووجهات النظر الخاصه بها، مع بعض من تطبيقاتها الصناعية، بالإضافة إلى برنامج تعليمي تطبيقي عن علوم البيانات الكبيره.

data.description:
🔖 FREE 
🚀 Doors: 19h30 
💡 Talk: 20h30 sharp 
🍸 + Unique cocktails and live music by Joli cœur

〰 Big Data & Privacy with Yves-Alexandre de Montjoye 〰

Privacy, does it still matter? What can mobile phone data be used for? How do we safely use big data while moving forward?

This last episode of this first season of Science & Cocktails in Brussels is a simultaneously fantastic and terrifying experience that will both raise concerns about your privacy and lead you to understand the human benefits of big data. A talk guided by Yves-Alexandre de Montjoye followed by the upcoming alternative rock band Joli Coeur.

We live in a time when information about most of our movements and actions is collected and stored in real time. Everyone is collecting some type of data from you: your google searches, your online food orders, your holiday locations and the profiles of others you check on Facebook. And the availability of large-scale mobile phone, credit card, browsing history, etc, dramatically increases our capacity to understand and potentially affect the behavior of individuals and collectives.

The use of this data, however, raises legitimate privacy concerns. In this event, Yves-Alexandre de Montjoye will discuss how traditional data protection mechanisms fail to protect people’s privacy in the age of big data. More specifically, he will show how sensitive information can often be inferred from seemingly innocuous data. He will then discuss some of the socially positive uses of big data and solutions that he and his group is developing at Imperial College London to allow large-scale behavioral data to be used while giving individual strong privacy guarantees.

Afterwards, private cocktails that can be collectively shared while Joli Coeur, an alternative pop rock band, takes the stage and will present its Debut album released this Fall.
data.name: Science & Cocktails #3: Big Data & Privacy

G.E.C a le plaisir de vous annoncer le lancement de sa prochaine session de Formation : Big Data

Le Big Data s’installe désormais dans le paysage des solutions de traitement des données massives. Il permet effectivement, grâce à la maîtrise des informations et des données, d’optimiser la performance opérationnelle de l’entreprise et ainsi de renforcer ses avantages concurrentiels. Si pour certains d’entre nous, le Big Data reste un concept imprécis, pour d’autres, il ouvre donc déjà la voie à de nombreuses applications. Cette formation pratique apporte un éclairage sur les usages et les technologies associées au Big Data. Il répond aux questions de son exploitation au sein de l’entreprise.

data.description:
We are excited to announce one of our biggest seminars of this year!

From SIRI to self-driving cars, artificial intelligence (AI) is progressing rapidly. While science fiction often portrays AI as robots with human-like characteristics, AI can encompass anything from Google’s search algorithms to IBM’s Watson to autonomous machines. Another development that has made great impact is big data. Big data describes a holistic information management strategy that includes and integrates many new types of data and data management.

We are proud to announce that, together with IBM and Microsoft we are organizing a seminar about artificial intelligence and big data! Jesse van Leth, an AI specialist from Microsoft is going to talk about what AI exactly is and how it affects our society and lives. Furthermore, Mando Rotman, a senior manager consultant cognitive & analytics at IBM, and Madli Uutma, a data scientist consultant at IBM are going to cover multiple topics related to big data. 

So are you curious about our future and how technology will shape it? And are you looking for an opportunity to learn more about AI and Big data from managers who work within these fields for leading companies? Then sign up for this event!

*This event is FREE, sign up before the attendance capacity is full!*

10 березня, продовжуючи традицію, ми знову будемо проводити конференцію AI&BigData Day в місті Лева. Подія збере близько 350 data scientist, розробників, стартап-підприємців, науковців, дата інженерів, інвесторів та зацікавлених з України, Німеччини, Чехії, Швейцарії, США, Канади та країн східної Європи. Виступить близько 40 досвідчених доповідачів.

Конференція присвячена новітнім розробкам у сфері штучного інтелекту та обробки великих даних. Це професійно дискусійний майданчик, який об’єднує дослідників і практиків, котрі працюють в нових фронтирах розвитку можливостей людства. Майданчик покликаний поєднати науковий підхід, підприємницький хист та інженерні таланти заради розповсюдження новітніх знань.

Потоки конференції: 
* Data Science
Потік створений для всіх хто хоче дізнатися про найновіші ідеї та підходи у галузі Data Science, а також познайомитися зі своїми потенційними менторами та партнерами.
* Startups
Потік для всіх тих, хто буквально з ліхтарем ходить у пошуках відповідей. Розширте свої горизонти і отримаєте нові знання. Останні тренди, доповіді про використання кращих інструментів, інсайти від експертів, унікальні знання з перших вуст.
* Data Engineering
Потік для розробників і науковців, хто створює нові технології і бажає познайомитися з успішними кейсами і реальними прикладами впровадження технологій на основі даних, які вже ефективно працюють на ринку сьогодні.
*Workshops
Потік для глибшого занурення в цікаву тему та отримання практичних знань.

data.description:
Big data bring great opportunities for both understanding the complex world we live in and making our lives better—but they are also ripe for misuse. In many areas of science increasingly powerful technologies allow researchers to generate a whole lot of data, which are then disseminated via digital databases. Having heaps of data available online sounds great, but it raises real problems. How are we to explore and make sense of this enormous quantity of data? Philosophers have had a lot to say about how we can make robust inferences by triangulating between multiple lines of evidence, and how we handle data in order to yield meaningful and reliable knowledge. I will draw on this literature to examine the conditions under which big data should be aggregated and interpreted. I then discuss the ways in which big data misuse could significantly damage the credibility and trustworthiness of scientific research as a whole.

About the speaker

Sabina Leonelli is a professor in philosophy and history of science at the University of Exeter, UK, where she co-direct the Exeter Centre for the Study of the Life Sciences and leads the “Data Studies” research strand. Her research focuses on the philosophy of data-intensive science, especially the methods and assumptions involved in the production, dissemination and use of data in biology and biomedicine; the ways in which the open science movement is redefining what counts as research and knowledge across different research environments; and the epistemic status of experimental organisms as models and data sources, particularly in plant science. Her work involves collaborations with natural and social scientists, and historians of science; involvement in science policy initiatives such as the European Open Science Cloud and Open Science Policy Platform; and multiple sources of funding including a European Research Council award (2014-2019). She has widely published in the philosophy of science as well as biology and STS, and her monograph Data-Centric Biology: A Philosophical Study appeared in 2016 with Chicago University Press.
data.name: How to (Re)Use Big Data w/Prof Sabina Leonelli

T: +65 6100 1503 | E: hello@casugol.com | W: www.casugol.com

The worldwide revenue for Big Data and Data Analytics will grow to more than $203 Billion in 2020.

Banking specifically will see the fastest spending growth, and industries such as telecommunications, insurance, transportation, and utilities will also start to increase their own spending during this same period, helping to fuel growth.

Together with an increase interest and investment in AI, new tools for collecting and analysing data and new enterprise roles and responsibilities will emerge presenting IT professionals and individuals planning to pursue a career in Big Data and Data Analytics with tremendous career opprotunities.

This can never be a better time to acquire the necessary skills and gain proficiency in Big Data and Data Analytics

COURSE OBJECTIVE
Advanced Big Data Professional (ABDP) is a course on how to use Big Data to identify correlation and causation statistically valid models to help them make more accurate decisions.

COURSE DURATION
4 Days

COURSE OUTLINE

 Data Types & RDBMS Concepts

Structured Query Language – SQL Basics

Data Warehousing Concepts

Data Modeling Concepts

Unix Commands

Introduction to Big Data and Hadoop

Hadoop Architecture

Hadoop Deployment

Introduction to HDFS

Introduction to MapReduce

Pig Scripting for Data Flow

Apache Hive – Hive Query Language

NoSQL Concepts

HBase NoSQL Database

Hortonworks & Other Hadoop Distributions

Apache Sqoop

Apache Flume

Big Data Ecosystem & its Components

Hadoop Troubleshooting

Big Data Project with multiple technologies

Pre-Requisites
A valid Certification of Competency either Business Analytics Essential (BAE), or some basic understanding in software development

Examination
Participants are encouraged to attempt and pass an examination at the end of the course. This exam tests a candidate’s knowledge and skills related to Big Data on the syllabus covered in the course

Certification
Participants will be awarded a Certificate of Competency in Advanced Big Data Professional (ABDP) upon meeting the requirements of the course and passing the examination.

WHO WILL BENEFIT FROM THIS COURSE?
This course is designed for participants who are interested in pursuing a career in the areas of Big Data.

Advanced Big Data Professional (ABDP) is intended to equip you with a set of skills that you can draw on to implement the technology in your organisation.

Class is limited to 20 participants as hands-on sessions and real-time demonstration is expected.

data.description:
Tham gia chủ đề BẮT ĐẦU VỚI BIG DATA TỪ ĐÂU VÀ NHƯ THẾ NÀO? tại Vietnam Web Summit 2017

Đối với các lập trình viên, Big Data thường gắn liền với Apache Hadoop - công nghệ dựa trên GFS (Google File System) và MapReduce của Google. Tháng 4/2008, Hadoop trở thành hệ thống nhanh nhất để sắp xếp (sort) 1 terabyte dữ liệu, khi mất 209 giây chạy trên cluster gồm 910 nodes. Tháng 11/2008, Google thông báo hệ thống MapReduce chỉ cần 68 giây để sắp xếp 1 terabyte dữ liệu. Đến tháng 5/2009, Yahoo sử dụng Hadoop chỉ cần 62 giây để làm việc tương tự. Từ đó đến nay, Hadoop dần trở thành nòng cốt để giải quyết những bài toán về dữ liệu lớn.

Tuy nhiên, vào năm 2015, Apache Spark (gọi tắt Spark) nổi lên là 1 trong những dự án mã nguồn mở sôi động nhất trong lĩnh vực Big Data, thường xuyên được cập nhật bởi hơn 800 lập trình viên từ 200 công ty trên khắp thế giới, được cho rằng sẽ là sự thay thế Apache Hadoop trong tương lai. Chính cha đẻ của Spark cũng xác định Spark vừa hữu ích cho học máy lẫn xử lý luồng dữ liệu hoàn chỉnh. Đặc biệt, các dev có thể viết ứng dụng Spark bằng nhiều ngôn ngữ khác nhau, từ Scala, Java, Python, đến R. Nhờ những ưu điểm đó mà có rất nhiều hãng lớn đã dùng Spark cho các sản phẩm của mình như Yahoo, ebay, IBM, Cisco, Tencent, Alibaba… với cả petabyte dữ liệu.
Vậy, Hadoop và Spark, đâu mới là lựa chọn thích hợp để phát triển các dự án Big Data? Sau thời gian phát triển lâu dài, thể hiện tính hữu ích trong nhiều sản phẩm, liệu hệ sinh thái Hadoop có thể bị thay thế hoàn toàn bởi Spark? Cùng đến với topic Bắt đầu với Big Data từ đâu và như thế nào? do diễn giả Ông Xuân Hồng (Ong Xuan Hong) - Research Enginner của Trusting Social tại Vietnam Web Summit 2017 để cập nhật những kinh nghiệm làm việc với Big Data thiết thực nhất. 
Chỉ cần đăng kí tại: https://meetup.vn/detail/Vietnam-Web-Summit-2017-191 bạn sẽ tiếp cận được gần 100 topics đặc sắc khác tại Vietnam Web Summit năm nay và nhận được toàn bộ slide của các diễn giả sau sự kiện. Tại sao bạn còn chần chừ?
=======================

data.description:
Мы продлили регистрацию. 
Приглашаем присоединиться к миру Data Science.
Наша программа - это набор специально подобранных курсов, включающих в себя как фундаментальные знания в сфере анализа данных и компьютерных наук, так и изучение практических средств и инструментов для построения систем машинного обучения. 
Выпускники данной программы будут способны самостоятельно решать весь спектр задач анализа данных и машинного обучения на любом этапе: от постановки задачи до внедрения. 
Программа ориентирована прежде всего на тех, кто пробовал и умеет писать программы, желает глубоко понимать алгоритмы и процессы в области машинного обучения, но, при этом, не имеет профильного образования.
Продолжительность программы составляет 9 месяцев, которые включают в себя 3 модуля, каждый из которых состоит из теоретической части (2 месяца) и командной разработки программного проекта (1 месяц).

      Модули программы включают следующие курсы:

Модуль 1

Программирование на языке Python - 16 занятий. 
Данный курс включает в себя изучение управляющих структур языка, модулей стандартной библиотеки, а также объектно-ориентированного программирования на языке Python - основном языке всех Data Science-специалистов, а также основы создания веб-приложений и современных Agile-методологий разработки (Scrum).

Базы данных - 8 занятий. 
В основе курса лежит изучение реляционных СУБД и ряда популярных NoSQL систем, знание которых необходимо для эффективной обработки больших объемов информации. 

Модуль 2

Алгоритмы анализа данных - 16 занятий. 
Курс объединяет наиболее важные разделы фундаментальных дисциплин в области Computer Science и посвящен изучению способов представления данных, основных алгоритмов обработки данных, а также способов оценки их сложности. 

Математические основы анализа данных - 8 занятий. 
Как правило, в современной литературе алгоритмы машинного обучения принято рассматривать как “черный ящик”, что сильно ограничивает понимание диапазона их возможного применения. Данный курс призван решить ту проблему и для этого включает основные разделы теории вероятностей и статистики, математического анализа и линейной алгебры, необходимые для понимания алгоритмов анализа данных и машинного обучения. 

Модуль 3

Анализ данных и машинное обучение - 16 занятий. 
Курс включает в себя изучение основных библиотек для анализа данных, таких как pandas и scikit-learn, а также алгоритмов и способов применения алгоритмов машинного обучения. Рассматривается полный цикл машинного обучения начиная от анализа сырых данных, извлечения и подготовки признаков и заканчивая построением модели и оценкой ее точности.

Введение в Big Data - 8 занятий. 
В данном курсе рассматриваются технологии обработки данных больших объемов с использованием библиотек pySpark и TensorFlow. 

Преподаватели курса:

Денис Замятин - к.т.н., доцент, практикующий тренер, с 20-летним стажем в сфере разработки программного обеспечения, в том числе с 2010 г. на Python. 

Андрей Петрашенко - к.т.н., доцент, опытный преподаватель КПИ и практикующий разработчик программных систем на основе продуктов MySQL, PostgreSQL, redis, MongoDB, а также Oracle с 1999 г. 
 
Даты и график обучения:  
06 ноября - первый урок.
Дни занятий: Пн., Чт., Пятн. 
Время с 19.00 до 22.00  

Цена курса, варианты оплаты:

Для наших студентов предоставляется возможность оплачивать обучение помесячно, помодульно, а также за весь курс сразу. 

1 месяц - 2900 грн. 
1 модуль- 8700 грн. 
Весь курс - 26000 грн. 

Регистрация и предоплата обязательны!

Ссылка на регистрацию и реквизиты для предоплаты: http://www.shuttle65.com/event/data-science-boot-camp-2017-10-19-2018-06-29-25/register

data.description:
Calling for beginners, IT Pros, business users and more!

More and more companies now start to leverage big data technologies to turn these data into business insights. Are you looking for ways to implement Big Data Analytics to your business, but not sure where to start? 

Come to this session to discover how you can leverage the FREE Microsoft tools and resources to build your first data analytics project – without an in-house data scientist or statistics degree. 

You'll learn:
• Data Science 101 – Understand the basics of turning your raw data to visualized business insight
• Don’t know where to start? Learn what you can do with existing industry-specific models in Cortana Intelligence Gallery and Azure Machine Learning Studio
• Got no budget? Discover how you can use our free Azure credit offerings and our machine learning tools in your prototype
• Expert Sharing – Our professionals will share their experiences with data science projects in the real business setting.

Register here: https://aka.ms/Rpk5z1

data.description:
🔖 FREE 
🚀 Doors: 19h30 
💡 Talk: 20h30 sharp 
🍸 + Unique cocktails and live music by Joli cœur

〰 Big Data & Privacy with Yves-Alexandre de Montjoye 〰

Privacy, does it still matter? What can mobile phone data be used for? How do we safely use big data while moving forward?

This last episode of this first season of Science & Cocktails in Brussels is a simultaneously fantastic and terrifying experience that will both raise concerns about your privacy and lead you to understand the human benefits of big data. A talk guided by Yves-Alexandre de Montjoye followed by the upcoming alternative rock band Joli Coeur.

We live in a time when information about most of our movements and actions is collected and stored in real time. Everyone is collecting some type of data from you: your google searches, your online food orders, your holiday locations and the profiles of others you check on Facebook. And the availability of large-scale mobile phone, credit card, browsing history, etc, dramatically increases our capacity to understand and potentially affect the behavior of individuals and collectives.

The use of this data, however, raises legitimate privacy concerns. In this event, Yves-Alexandre de Montjoye will discuss how traditional data protection mechanisms fail to protect people’s privacy in the age of big data. More specifically, he will show how sensitive information can often be inferred from seemingly innocuous data. He will then discuss some of the socially positive uses of big data and solutions that he and his group is developing at Imperial College London to allow large-scale behavioral data to be used while giving individual strong privacy guarantees.

Afterwards, private cocktails that can be collectively shared while Joli Coeur, an alternative pop rock band, takes the stage and will present its Debut album released this Fall.
data.name: Science & Cocktails #3: Big Data & Privacy

data.description:
#นี่มันงานอะไร!!
งาน meet up ครั้งแรกของเพจ Data Science ชิลชิล จับมือกับ DataRockie เพื่อแชร์ประการณ์เรียนและทำงาน เล่าสู่กันฟังสำหรับเพื่อนๆที่สนใจด้าน data โดยเฉพาะ 

ในงานพบกับแอดมินเพิท มาเล่า มาแชร์ประสบการเรียนต่อปริญญาโทด้าน data science ที่ Monash University ประเทศออสเตรเลีย (ท๊อป U ของออส ท๊อป 100 ของโลก) แนะแนว แนะนำแนวทางสำหรับเพื่อนๆ น้องๆ ที่อยากเรียนต่อด้าน data science/ analytics

ส่วนแอดทอย เป็นตัวประกอบเฉยๆงานนี้ 555+ เด๋วเราจะไปเล่าว่าจากคนจบการตลาดธรรมดา เปลี่ยนสายงานมาทำด้าน data เขียนโค้ดได้ยังไง รวมถึงแชร์เทคนิคการเรียนรู้ด้วยตัวเองผ่านสื่อออนไลน์ต่างๆอย่างมีประสิทธิภาพ และปิดท้ายด้วย self-learning roadmap ในปี 2018

ยังมีแขกพิเศษอีกหลายคน ที่เรากำลังติดต่อให้มาพูดในงานนนนนี้ฮะ :) 

#เจอกันวันไหน
วันจันทร์ที่ 19 ก.พ. 2561 เวลา 19.00 น. นั่งคุยกันประมาณ 2 ชั่วโมง เม้ามอย พร้อมอาหาร เครื่องดื่ม น้ำอัดลม เบียร์ฟรี ตลอดงาน เฮ 555+

#เจอกันที่ไหน
LINK Collaboration Space เดินทางสะดวกด้วย MRT ขึ้นสถานีหัวลำโพง แล้วเดินไปก็ได้ 12 นาที หรือจะต่อแท๊กซี่ 5 นาทีถึงเลยจ้า แผนที่: https://goo.gl/maps/wtZZAo89Rft

#ค่าใช้จ่าย
300 บาท (รวมหมดแล้วทั้งค่าสถานที่ ค่าอาหาร ค่าเครื่องดื่ม เบียร์!) ถือว่ามากินข้าวเย็นด้วยกันเนอะ 55+ ที่นั่งจำกัด สามารถกดจองที่นั่งได้ที่ลิ้งนี้เลยครับ https://meetup.dataly.co/

#ต้องเตรียมตัวอะไรยังไงบ้าง
งานนี้โคตรชิล ไม่ต้องเตรียมตัวไรมา ไม่มี dress code จะขาสั้น เท้าแตะมาก็ได้ 555+

สอบถามเพิ่มเติมได้ที่ m.me/datarockie หรือ m.me/datasciencechill

มาเถอะ อยากเจอ ชุ๊บ
แล้วพบกันนะคร้าบบบบบ

Встреча посвященная Data Science в формате leancoffee. Этот формат подразумевает формирование тем для общения в начале встречи. Минимальные требования: окончание одного из онлайн курсов по Data Science (есть на edx, coursera и еще много где), желательно, но не обязательно участие в соревнованиях типа Kaggle. Без этого, думаю, будет не очень интересно. 
Участие бесплано, регистрация желательна.

data.description:
বাংলাদেশ ইনোভেশন ফোরাম আগামী ১৪ ডিসেম্বর সফটওয়্যার টেকনোলজি পার্ক (জনতা টাওয়ার, কনফারেন্স রুম) এ “ডাটা সায়েন্স” নিয়ে একটি সেমিনারের আয়োজন করতে যাচ্ছে। 

দিন দিন ব্যবসা, বিজ্ঞান, গবেষণা, সমাজ ব্যবস্থা, চিকিৎসা, রাজনীতি, মহাকাশবিজ্ঞান ও অনেক রকম ফিল্ডে ডাটা সায়েন্সের প্রয়োজন বেড়েই চলেছে। প্রয়োজন বাড়লেও অনেক বিশাল পরিমাণ ডাটা নিয়ে কাজ করে যথাযথ ফলাফল বা সিদ্ধান্ত আনার জন্য যে পরিমাণ অভিজ্ঞ লোক প্রয়োজন সেটা বর্তমানে নেই। ডাটা (বিশেষ করে বিগ ডাটা) নিয়ে যারা কাজ করেন, তাদেরকে বেশ কয়েকটি ভাগে ভাগ করা যায় যেমন - ডাটা ইঞ্জিনিয়ার, ডাটা সায়েনটিস্ট, স্ট্যাটিসটিসিয়ান, ডাটা অ্যানালিস্ট। অনেকেই ইদানীং মনে করছেন দিন দিন যেভাবে ডাটা বাড়ছে সে অনুযায়ী সেই ডাটা গুলো থেকে যথাযথ প্রায়োগিক ফলাফল বের করে আনার মত উপযুক্ত ডাটা প্রফেশনালের অভাবটাই এখন বড় চ্যালেঞ্জ। 

যারা ভবিষ্যতে ডাটা সায়েন্স নিয়ে ক্যারিয়ার গড়তে আগ্রহী শুধুমাত্র তারাই স্থান, সময় এবং সার্বিক বিবেচনায় শতভাগ আসার নিশ্চয়তা দিয়ে রেজিস্ট্রেশন করুন। রেজিস্ট্রেশন ফ্রি। 

**ডাটা সাইন্স নিয়ে আমদের দীর্ঘ মেয়াদি পরিকল্পনার ফলস্বরূপ ডাটা সাইন্টিস্ট গ্রূপ আকারে এটাই প্রথম টেক টক। সুতরাং, শুধুমাত্র ভবিষ্যৎ পরিকল্পনার কথা চিন্তা করেই দীর্ঘমেয়াদি আমাদের কার্যক্রমে অংশগ্রহণ করুন। সীট সংখ্যা ৪০। 

রেজিস্ট্রেশনের জন্য ভিজিট করুন- https://goo.gl/forms/QEAaQ0JblOgqJdus1 এই ঠিকানায়। 

** রেজিস্ট্রেশন সম্পন্ন করেও যদি না আসেন, তাহলে পরবর্তীতে বাংলাদেশ ইনোভেশন ফোরাম আয়োজিত সকল অনুষ্ঠানে অযোগ্য বলে বিবেচনা করা হবে। 
অনুষ্ঠানের নামঃ   সেমিনার অন “ডাটা সায়েন্স”
তারিখঃ            ১৪ ডিসেম্বর, ২০১৭ 
স্থানঃ               সফটওয়্যার টেকনোলজি পার্ক (জনতা টাওয়ার, কনফারেন্স রুম)
সময়ঃ              সকাল ১০টা- দুপুর ১২ টা

data.description:
🔉Today's, the amount of existing digital 
     data obtained from various resources is 
     growing in a tremendous rate. The big 
     data science field aims to deal with a 
     huge amount of data that is most often    
     impossible to store in the memory of a 
     single computer, and this would be from 
     various perspectives including: big data 
     cleaning, preparation, and analysis as 
     well as extracting insights and 
     information from large structured and 
     unstructured data sets. 

الان في ظل زيادة كمية البيانات الرقمية الموجودة و التي يتم الحصول عليها من مختلف الموارد بمعدلات هائله. تهدف علوم البيانات الكبيرة الي التعامل مع الكميات الضخمة من البيانات التي من المستحيل في أغلب الأحيان تخزينها في ذاكرة جهاز كمبيوتر واحد، و يتم ذلك من منظورات مختلفة بما في ذلك: تنقيه البيانات الكبيرة، وإعدادها ، وتحليلها، وكذلك استخراج التصورات والمعلومات من مجموعات  البيانات المنظمة وغير المنظمة. 

💪Due to the importance of such field and 
     its various applications in industry, 
🏢National Telecommunication Institute-
     NTI is organizing a workshop on "Big 
     data science" gathers the big data 
     specialists and data scientists in Egypt 
     from multinational companies, academia 
     and private sector to share their 
     knowledge and expertise across multiple 
     industries. 

و نظرا لأهمية هذا المجال وتطبيقاته المختلفة في الصناعة، يقوم المعهد القومي للاتصالات السلكية واللاسلكية بتنظيم ورشة عمل بشأن 'علوم البيانات الكبيرة' بالتعاون مع الشركات المتعددة الجنسيات والخبراء من الأوساط الأكاديمية والقطاع الخاص من اجل تبادل المعرفه والخبره عبر الصناعات المتعددة.

🎯The objective of the workshop is to  
      provide a general overview of big data 
      science, its main concepts and 
      perspectives with an eye on some of its 
      industrial applications, in addition to a 
      big data science tutorial.

وسوف تقدم ورشة العمل لمحة عامة عن علوم البيانات الكبيرة، ومفاهيمها الرئيسية ووجهات النظر الخاصه بها، مع بعض من تطبيقاتها الصناعية، بالإضافة إلى برنامج تعليمي تطبيقي عن علوم البيانات الكبيره.

👉The Targeted Audience‭:‬
      -Engineers who work in the field of  ICT,  
         particularly in Big data field.‬
       -R &D.
       -Data scientists.
       -Fresh graduates.
       -Senior computer, electronics and  
         communication engineering students.                               

الحضور المستهدفين:
- المهندسين العاملين في المجال.

You must order your FREE ticket through our website to attend:
http://ga.co/2zAdYz4

Step into the world of data science with General Assembly. 
During our introductory workshop, explore the job Harvard Business Review has dubbed “the sexiest of the 21st century,” and see how modern businesses are harnessing the power of data to drive innovation. 

Working with real-world case studies, you’ll:
- Learn what data scientists do and the types of problems they solve.
- Walk through the typical data science workflow and see how the pros identify powerful business predictions.
- Explore key tools and processes data scientists use to analyze, visualize, and model data.

Apply what you’ve learned to a data set to produce your own recommendations.

No prior knowledge required!

Spaces are limited.

Register here:
http://ga.co/2zAdYz4
data.name: FREE: Intro to Data Science

data.description:
Infography Technologies is organizing 2 days 'Data Science Workshop' with Certification on Nepal Engineers Association, Engineers Bhawan, Pulchwok. Only limited seats are available, so book your seat today. 

The participants are required to have basic knowledge of the following:
■ Basic Statistics(Mean, Median, Mode, Percentile)
■ Python Programming

Irrespective of Operating System, the participants are required to install the following, prior to attending seminar:
■ Python and python-pip
■ Sublime Text
■ Selenium and BeautifulSoup
■ Anaconda

Our session will follow the schedule mentioned below:

▶ First day:

	1st half: 
		■ Automated Data Mining and Web Scraping using Selenium And BeautifulSoup
		■ Preparing and cleaning Data for analysis in proper format

	2nd half:
		■ Introduction To Machine Learning Concept 
		■ Introduction to Supervised (Regression and Classification) Learning
		■ Design and building Regression and Classification model

▶ Second Day:

	1st half::
		■ Feature Extraction and Preprocessing for Image and Text
		■ Unsupervised Learning With K-means

	2nd half:
		■ Introduction to Perceptron And Artificial Intelligence


Workshop Duration: 11AM to 4PM

Price: NRs. 1000/-
Tickets will be provided on First Come First Serve basis. Tickets available at Infography Technologies, Jwagal, Lalitpur. You can book the tickets at www.infographytechnologies.com/Event 
Please check your email for confirmation after booking.

For ticket collection please visit our office on 5th and 6th December (11AM to 3PM). You can also get Ticket symbol number by online payment (Esewa ID: 9840068697).

You will be provided with:
■ Tea and Snacks
■ Lunch
■ Participation Certificate
■ Goodies
■ Gift Hampers

For any queries: info@infographytechnologies.com

Infography Technologies
Jwagal, Lalitpur
www.infographytechnologies.com
